title: How to Fix a Squeaky Door
steps: Open and close the door to identify the squeaky hinge(s).
Hold a cloth underneath the hinge to catch drips.
Spray a small amount of lubricant onto the hinge pin.
Open and close the door several times to work the lubricant in.
Wipe off any excess lubricant with the cloth.
Repeat for other squeaky hinges as needed.
